name: Restoration V0.1 (Eclipse Games Studios)
description: The world is in chaos - a machine you just created to stop global warming has malfunctioned and everything has gone out of scale  - ants are the size of skyscrapers and elephants are barely visible! The world is now under the reign of the most vile and malicious lord ever - The Titan. You must save the world from entering turmoil from the controlled animals and the Titan by obtaining the restoration orb - the most powerful object ever, one that hinders even the strongest of damage - and use it to restore your device to save the world! Do you have what it takes? We hope you do - the worlds counting on you!
